attributes.documentation:
CappedToken implement ERC20 and ERC20Basic interfaces
throught BasicToken and StandardToken classes
Completed by MintableToken class wich allow to change totalSupply amount
CappedToken allow to limit maximum amount of tokens
CappedToken is ownable. It mean that the address of the contract initial caller
is set a variable called owner. This ownership can be transferred.
We can use a modifier called 'onlyOwner' after public keyword to allow
an action only for the owner.
attributes.name: BTU
